Title: Top Line Product Sales
Description: Gross Sales - top-line product sales without counting refunds, discounts, comps, tips, tax, fees, or gift card sales

Title: Net Sales
Description: Top line sales after discounts and itemized returns

Title: Total Collected Amount
Description: Total amount collected from the customer. Includes modifiers, discounts, tips, tax, gift card sales, returns, refunds, and cash rounding

Title: Total Amount
Description: The total amount for the payment, including amount and tip, or the amount of money refunded

Title: Item Gross Sales
Description: Gross sales amount (sales are positive, returns are negative)

Title: Net Quantity
Description: Net quantity (sales are positive, returns are negative)

Title: New Customers Count
Description: Count of new customers (first order with merchant)

Title: Fee Amount
Description: The fee amount. Displayed as a negative value to represent costs incurred by the seller

Title: Total Amount Voided
Description: Total amount of voided line items
